description:
Showcase of a Custom Property-Validator working on a list property and executed in the cluster.

It will check that no duplicate range entries will be added to the list.

For the Java implementation check out [ExamplePropertyValidatorForListSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExamplePropertyValidatorForListSchema.java)

constraints.customMessage: The list of number ranges may not contains duplicates

numberRangeList.description: A list of number ranges. This list may not contain duplicate entries.
